generation_1.Lysander_Ashford_x_Cassandra_Ashford: Loveless political marriage; mutual respect but no romance; growing apart
generation_1.Lysander_Ashford_x_Dmitri_Volkov: 50-year vendetta; bitter enemies; trapped in cycle of retaliation
generation_1.Lysander_Ashford_x_Sienna_Cross: Unknown father-daughter; he sends money but doesn't acknowledge her
generation_1.Lysander_Ashford_x_Thane_Rourke: Unknown rivals - Thane has the love of the woman Lysander married but doesn't love
generation_1.Cassandra_Ashford_x_Dmitri_Volkov: Secret peace negotiations; mutual respect developing
generation_1.Cassandra_Ashford_x_Thane_Rourke: Lost lovers; haven't seen each other in 30 years; still think of each other

generation_2.Marcus_Ashford_x_Victoria_Ashford: Loving siblings; Victoria resents his privilege but protects him
generation_2.Marcus_Ashford_x_Sienna_Cross: Unknown half-siblings; will meet and have immediate attraction (forbidden/incestuous without knowing)
generation_2.Marcus_Ashford_x_Nikolai_Volkov: Supposed enemies; secret mutual respect; both want peace
generation_2.Marcus_Ashford_x_Zara_Volkov: Haven't met; she hates him on principle as enemy
generation_2.Victoria_Ashford_x_Nikolai_Volkov: Being set up for arranged marriage by their families (don't know yet)
generation_2.Victoria_Ashford_x_Zara_Volkov: Secret friendship through encrypted messages; kindred spirits; different approaches to rebellion
generation_2.Nikolai_Volkov_x_Zara_Volkov: Siblings; he thinks she's too radical; she thinks he's too soft; both love each other
generation_2.Nikolai_Volkov_x_Sienna_Cross: Attraction across class lines; complicated by politics
generation_2.Sienna_Cross_x_Rafe_Stone: Best friends; he knows all her secrets

cross_generation.Lysander_x_Marcus: Father-son; Lysander's impossible standards; Marcus desperate for approval
cross_generation.Lysander_x_Victoria: Father-daughter; he barely sees her; she resents being invisible
cross_generation.Cassandra_x_Marcus: Mother-son; warm but Marcus doesn't confide his doubts
cross_generation.Cassandra_x_Victoria: Mother-daughter; close; Cassandra wants better for Victoria
cross_generation.Dmitri_x_Nikolai: Grandfather-grandson; love with toxic pressure to continue vendetta
cross_generation.Dmitri_x_Zara: Grandfather-granddaughter; she's his favorite; he fears her radicalism
cross_generation.Thane_x_Marcus: Will meet; Thane will see Cassandra in him
cross_generation.Thane_x_Victoria: Will meet; Thane will recognize her intelligence

power_dynamics.The_Seven_Families: Ashford (political/capital), Volkov (industrial/mining), Meridian (agricultural), Sterling (merchant), Chen (military), Navarro (technology), Kane (transit/trade)
power_dynamics.Transit_Authority: Holds ultimate power through gate control; playing families against each other
power_dynamics.The_Council: Seven family representatives; deadlocked between Ashford and Volkov factions
power_dynamics.Worker_Movements: Growing power; led by figures like Rafe Stone and Sienna Cross; radicalized by Zara
power_dynamics.Reformist_Movements: Secret; led by Elena Navarro; supported by Cassandra and Victoria

major_tensions.Ashford_vs_Volkov: 50-year vendetta over Pavel's death; threatens to tear Hegemony apart
major_tensions.Aristocracy_vs_Workers: Class warfare brewing; workers tired of being exploited
major_tensions.Old_vs_Young: Longevity treatments mean old guard won't die; young generation can't rise
major_tensions.Tradition_vs_Progress: Rigid social structures vs desire for reform
major_tensions.Love_vs_Duty: Personal desires vs family obligations - affects almost every character

forbidden_attractions.Marcus_and_Sienna: Half-siblings who don't know; attraction forbidden on multiple levels
